subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|虍|丘|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t2=hill}}. The lower component is retains the shape of {{zh-l|*丠}}, the ancient form of {{zh-l|*丘}}.

subSections.text:

|m=xū
|c=heoi1
|h=pfs=hî
|md=hṳ̆

|mn_note=Taiwan: hi - vernacular; hu - literary
|mn-t=he1
|w=1he,1xy
|w_note=1he - vernacular; 1xy - literary
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=
|cat=a,pn
}}
